meaning: She is the supreme-most bliss known as Brahmananda.
commentary: Bliss (ānanda) is of many types. The bliss enjoyed by human being is Manushya- ānanda; bliss enjoyed by the Devatas is Deva-ānanda; bliss enjoyed by Gandharvas is Gandharva-ananda and so on. Among all these different types of Ananda, the bliss enjoyed by Brahma is the most supreme and is known as Brahmānanda.
